name: 張文中
objective:
This Advanced Robotics and Automation Applications (ARAA) course is offered only for upto 14 graduate students with programming experience.  In addition to lectures on robotic manipulation, ARAA also focuses on projects with mobile robots and manipulators in the topics of interest related to:
高等機器人與自動化應用(ARAA)適合研究生修習，因設備因素限14人，須具備程式能力。除教授機器人學外，亦聚焦於移動式機器人與機械手臂專題，相關主題如下：
1. Spatial descriptions and transformations 空間描述與數學轉換 
2. Manipulator kinematics 機械手臂運動學 
3. Manipulator inverse kinematics 機械手臂反向運動學
4. Linear control of manipulator 機械手臂之線性控制 
5. Project topics: manipulator and mobile robot control, and robot control system based on visual sensing 專題項目：機械手臂及移動式機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機器人控制系統。
schedule:
1st Week 第1週. Introduction 簡介
2nd Week 第2週. Spatial Descriptions & Transformations 空間描述與轉換
3rd Week 第3週. Representations for Orientation 方位取向表示
4th Week 第4週. Forward Kinematics 順向運動學
5th Week 第5週. FInverse Kinematic 逆向運動學
6th Week 第6週. Jacobian & Static Force 賈可比矩陣及靜力
7th Week 第7週. Manipulator Dynamics 機械手臂動力學
8th Week 第8週. Trajectory Generation and control of manipulators 軌跡規劃與機械手臂控制
9th Week 第9週. Project: Manipulator Control1 機械手臂操控專題1
10th Week 第10週. Project: Manipulator Control2 機械手臂操控專題2
11th Week 第11週. Project: Mobile Robot Obstacle Avoidance 移動式機器人避障專題
12th Week 第12週. Project: Vision-Based Control of Robots1 機器人視覺控制專題
13th Week 第13週. Project: Vision-Based Control of Robots2 機器人視覺控制專題
14th Week 第14週 Final Project 1 期末專題1
15th Week 第15週. Final Project 2 期末專題2
16th Week 第16週. Final Project 3 期末專題3
17th Week 第17週. Fianl Presentation and Demo 期末簡報及展示
scorePolicy: The final grade will be a weighted average of attendance and homework 20%, projects 50%, and final project 30%.
materials:
Introduction to Robotics: Mechanics and Control, John J. Craig, Addison-Wesley Publishing Company.

Robotics, Vision and Control: Fundamental Algorithms in MATLAB, Springer by Peter Corke
Publication Year: 2013 | ISBN 3642201431 | 1st Edition
